import{Screenplay}from'./implementation/Screenplay.js';import{SceneDirections}from'./implementation/SceneDirections.js';import{Manifesto}from'./implementation/Manifesto.js';import{Workflow}from'./implementation/Workflow.js';var app={};app.init=function(){// Initialization
var confirm_start=function confirm_start(yes){if(yes||window.confirm('start loading?')){scene_director.start();}else{setTimeout(confirm_start,5000);}};// Scene Director Implementation
var screen_play=new Screenplay();var scene_directions=new SceneDirections();var workflow=new Workflow();var manifesto=new Manifesto(scene_directions,workflow);var scene_director=new ScreenDirector(screen_play,manifesto,false);// Main Logic
